item.title: 爆炸性新闻：日本央行自 2007 年以来首次提高利率。日本央行表示，将引导隔夜利率保持在 0 至 0.1% 左右的范围内
item.description:
Breaking news: The Bank of Japan has raised interest rates for the first time since 2007. The BoJ said it would guide the overnight interest rate to remain in a range of around 0 to 0.1% https://t.co/DnGujSefHH pic.twitter.com/kkXvkRkdva

— Financial Times (@FT) March 19, 2024

item.title: 随着能源价格回落和出口回升，欧元区贸易数据喜人，燃起了人们对俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰造成的巨大冲击终于得到缓解的希望。以下是 @ft 提供的《混乱时代
item.description:
Promising eurozone trade data has fuelled hopes that the big shock caused by Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine is finally being unwound as energy prices fall back and exports pick up. Here's Disrupted Times https://t.co/x1m2o2roSK via @ft

— darrendodd (@darrendodd) March 18, 2024
